scReadSim.Utility.match_peak¶

scReadSim.Utility.match_peak(true_peakfile, ref_peakfile, outdirectory, assignment_file)[source]¶

Find the reference features for the given features true_peakfile according to the similarity of peak length. The assignment would be stored as assignment_file within outdirectory.

Parameters

  • true_peakfile (str) – Directory of the target features bed file.

  • ref_peakfile (str) – Directory of the reference features bed file.

  • outdirectory (str) – Output directory.

  • assignment_file (str) – Specify the name of peak assignment file.
